plugin.name: ðŸ§¹ Tidy
plugin.author: jgclark
plugin.description: Tidy up and delete various things in your NotePlan notes

plugin.commands.name: Remove @done() markers
plugin.commands.description: Remove @done() markers from recently-updated notes. Can be used with parameters from Template or Callback.

plugin.commands.name: Remove time parts from @done() dates
plugin.commands.description: Remove time parts of @done(date time) from recently-updated notes. Can be used with parameters from Template or Callback.

plugin.commands.name: Remove section from notes
plugin.commands.description: Remove a given section (heading + its content block) from recently-changed notes. Can be used with parameters from Template or Callback.

plugin.commands.name: Remove content under heading in all notes
plugin.commands.description: Remove a given section (heading + its content block) from all notes. Can be used with parameters from Template or Callback.

plugin.commands.name: Log notes changed in interval
plugin.commands.description: Write a list of Log notes changed in the last interval of days to the plugin log. It will default to the 'Default Recent Time Interval' setting unless passed as a parameter.

plugin.settings.title: Folders to exclude
plugin.settings.description: List of folders to exclude in these commands. May be empty.

plugin.settings.title: How many days to look back?
plugin.settings.description: The number of days to look back for 'recently changed' notes. If this is empty, then all notes will be checked.

plugin.settings.title: Type of match for section headings
plugin.settings.description: The 'Starts with' setting allows headings that always start the same (e.g. 'Habit Progress') to be matched, even if the end of the heading changes (e.g. 'Habit Progress for Tuesday').

plugin.settings.title: Just remove @done(...) markers from checklists?
plugin.settings.description: When removing @done(...) markers, remove just from done checklist items, not done tasks as well? (This is relevant when calculating heatmaps of when tasks but not checklists are completed in Summaries plugin.)

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Tidy commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
